Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to ensuring the payment of overtime due and owing for services rendered to combat the COVID-19 pandemic
Summary: Ensures the payment of overtime due and owing for services rendered to combat the COVID-19 pandemic.
LawCode: Amd ยง134, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to ensuring the payment of overtime due and owing for services rendered to combat the COVID-19 pandemic
